verses.1: Topa in uk a, vangliatna kumpi puan kisilhsak hi. Topa, kumpi puan kisilhsak a, thahatna tawh amah kidim hi. Leitung kikipsak a, kiliing ngei lo ding hi.
verses.2: Tanglai pek panin na tokhom a kip sa hi a, nang pen a tawntung a om na hi hi.
verses.3: Topa aw, gunte hong khangin, a aw uh hong sangsak a, nakpi takin hong ging hi.
verses.4: A sangna munah a om Topa vanglian hi. Tui tampi gingte sangin vanglian zaw a, tuipi hualte sangin vanglian zaw hi.
verses.5: Na thupiaknate kip mahmah hi. Topa aw, sianthona pen a tawntungin na inn tawh a kilawm ahi hi.
